data.title: THE FILMS OF SANTO, EL ENMASCARADO DE PLATA
data.text:
This filmography is listed by the year in which production began, which is the standard way of dating Mexican films (thus, a film which started shooting on 31 December 1968 is a "1968 film" in this system). Release dates and copyright dates on films may therefore differ from the dates below. Clicking on a hot-linked title will take you to a synopsis of that film.

We're Moving!! As of January 2023, I will probably no longer have access to maintain/update my "terpconnect" websites. I'm not sure how long they'll remain up.

https://davewiltfilms.net/filmsofelsanto is LIVE as of 1/1/2023.

The page you are on now will not be updated, beginning in 2023.

If you want to be notified of the new URLs, drop me a line at DWilt@davewiltfilms.net (note: I will only be using this email for website updates so I won't be monitoring it much) Thank you for being with us for nearly 30 years!

UPDATES:

HTML errors--FIXED (10 Sept 2021). Feel free to report any issues (email at bottom of page)

HTML errors! These suddenly cropped up (since early 2021) on about a dozen pages. I will correct these as quickly as possible, but bear with me and those weird icons. (9 September 2021)

1958:

CEREBRO DEL MAL (Brain of Evil)

SANTO VS. HOMBRES INFERNALES (Santo vs. the Infernal Men)

SANTO CONTRA LOS ZOMBIES (aka Invasion of the Zombies)

SANTO CONTRA EL REY DEL CRIMEN (Santo vs. the King of Crime)

SANTO EN EL HOTEL DE LA MUERTE (Santo in the Hotel of Death)

SANTO EN EL MUSEO DE CERA (Santo in the Wax Museum)

UPDATED AND GREATLY EXPANDED REVIEW: 9 October 2018

SANTO EL ENMASCARADO DE PLATA VS. LOS VILLANOS DEL RING (Santo the Silver-Masked One vs. the Villains of the Ring)

OPERACION 67 (Operation 67) Update: 22 Feb 2021

EL TESORO DE MOCTEZUMA (The Treasure of Montezuma)

SANTO CONTRA LOS CAZADORES DE CABEZAS (Santo vs. the Head Hunters)

SANTO FRENTE A LA MUERTE (Santo Faces Death) Note: link added 3 Feb 2020

1970:

SANTO CONTRA LOS JINETES DEL TERROR (Santo vs. the Riders of Terror)

LA VENGANZA DE LAS MUJERES VAMPIRO (The Vengeance of the Vampire Women)

SANTO CONTRA LA MAFIA DEL VICIO (Santo vs. the Vice Mafia)

SANTO EN LA VENGANZA DE LA MOMIA (Santo in the Vengeance of the Mummy): updated 16 Nov 2000.

LAS MOMIAS DE GUANAJUATO (The Mummies of Guanajuato)

ASESINOS DE OTROS MUNDOS (Killers from Other Worlds)

SANTO Y BLUE DEMON CONTRA DRACULA Y EL HOMBRE LOBO (Santo and Blue Demon vs. Dracula and the Wolf Man)

SANTO CONTRA LOS SECUESTRADORES (Santo vs. the Kidnapers)

SANTO CONTRA LA MAGIA NEGRA (Santo vs. Black Magic)

LAS BESTIAS DEL TERROR (The Beasts of Terror)

SANTO VS. LAS LOBAS (Santo vs. the She-Wolves)

ANONIMO MORTAL (Anonymous Death Threat)

1973:

SANTO Y BLUE DEMON CONTRA DR. FRANKENSTEIN (Santo and Blue Demon vs. Dr. Frankenstein)

SANTO CONTRA EL DOCTOR MUERTE (Santo vs. Dr. Death)

1974:

SANTO EN EL MISTERIO DE LA PERLA NEGRA (Santo in the Mystery of the Black Pearl)

LA VENGANZA DE LA LLORONA (The Vengeance of the Crying Woman)

1975:

SANTO EN ORO NEGRO (Santo in Black Gold)

1977:

MISTERIO EN LAS BERMUDAS (Mystery in Bermuda)

1979:

SANTO EN LA FRONTERA DEL TERROR (Santo on the Border of Terror) UPDATED: 3 July 2018

1981:

SANTO CONTRA EL ASESINO DE LA T.V. (Santo vs. the Television Killer)

CHANOC Y EL HIJO DEL SANTO VS. LOS VAMPIROS ASESINOS (Chanoc and The Son of Santo vs. the Killer Vampires) cameo

EL PUÑO DE LA MUERTE (The Fist of Death)

LA FURIA DE LAS KARATECAS (The Fury of the Karate Experts)

NOTE: Completely revised and updated as of 27 October 2022!

Santo Miscellany:

1952: EL ENMASCARADO DE PLATA (stars El Médico Asesino; originally a serial)

1961: LA SOMBRA BLANCA (Santo-like masked wrester)

1973: 3 Dev Adam (Three Mighty Men): the Turkish Santo movie.

1978: MEXICO DE MIS AMORES (My Beloved Mexico) (compilation film which includes clips from nearly 100 Mexican movies, including Asesinos de otros mundos)

1981: ÁDIOS, ÁDIOS ÍDOLO MÍO (short feature about a fictionalised El Santo)

1989: LA LEYENDA DE UNA MÁSCARA (fictionalised biopic of a Santo-like wrester)

2001: JESUS CHRIST VAMPIRE HUNTER (made in Canada, Jeff Moffet as "Santos")

2004: SANTO CONTRA LOS CLONES(5-episode animated series shown in Mexico)

2008: MASK OF SANTO (pilot for animated series)

2012: EL SANTOS VS. LA TETONA MENDOZA (animated feature)

2017: COCO (Santo makes a cameo appearance)

My Santo-related YouTube Documentaries:

Santo vs. Various Vampires pt 1 Santo vs. Various Vampires pt 2 El Santo: the Legend and His Automobiles Mummies a la Mexicana Episode 1 Part 1 Mummies a la Mexicana Episode 1 Part 2 Mummies a la Mexicana Episode 2 Part 1 Mummies a la Mexicana Episode 2 Part 2

El Hijo del Santo:

1981: CHANOC Y EL HIJO DEL SANTO VS. LOS VAMPIROS ASESINOS (Chanoc and The Son of Santo vs. the Killer Vampires)

1983: EL HIJO DEL SANTO EN FRONTERA SIN LEY

1991: EL PODER DEL OMNICRÓN (never completed or released)

1991: LA FUERZA DE UN ÍDOLO (direct-to-video)

1992: SANTO, LA LEYENDA DEL ENMASCARADO DE PLATA stars El Hijo del Santo (as himself), and the character of "Santo" is played by Daniel García.

2000: INFRATERRESTRE

2007: MIL MÁSCARAS VS. THE AZTEC MUMMMY

2008: EL HIJO DEL SANTO (short, made in Canada)

2016: LUCHA ILIMITADO VS. THE STATE OF WASHINGTON (wrestling matches, not a fictional film)

NEW JUNE 2022

Santo/Stranger things tie-ins (Doritos sponsored) (thanks to Albert Asker!)

Demogorgon vs. El Santo promo Santo vs. Demogorgon match

Read The Mexican Film Bulletin, now in its 26th year!

Our logo was made with the logo generator at Cool Archive.

This page constructed by D.Wilt (dwiltNOSPAM@umd.edu remove NOSPAM to email me) on 9 Dec 1996. Last update: 27 October 2022
